participant_1.background:
I live in the forest, where I am free to explore and be myself.
my favorite phone is as iphone.
Others get to see a happy, healthy me on my days off.
i grew up in the deep south.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to love folk metal.
i love my pet dog more than anything.
I am a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films.
I'm happy with my weight and would love to have lunch with Quentin Tarantino.
i m the middle child of 3 siblings.

content.text: Hi! I'm a huge fan of folk metal, myself. What's your favorite band?
Nice to meet you! My favorite folk metal band is Eluveitie. I love their music and their story telling.
I've heard of them, but I haven't listened to their music yet. I'll have to check them out.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch movies and collect memorabilia from my favorite films. I'm a big fan of Quentin Tarantino and I would love to have lunch with him one day.
That's awesome! I love movies too. What's your favorite movie of all time?
That's a tough question. I think I'd have to say The Shawshank Redemption. It's such a well-made movie with an amazing story.
That's a great choice! I love that movie too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go hiking and explore the forest. I also like to play video games and read.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been hiking before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and see some beautiful scenery.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion
